title: How are BookMyShow Gift Cards delivered? How long does it take? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
BookMyShow Gift Cards are purely "E-cards" and will be emailed to the recipients instantly.
Also, you can schedule an E-card in advance as a surprise to your friends/family.
Still, no luck? share the invoice ID and contact details used while transacting
here
and the team would connect with you.
